name: cat-herding
description: Cat Herders: The cat herding game of herding cats

scripts.build: browserify public-dev/src/main.js -o public-dev/src/bundle.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 stage-1 ] ]
scripts.watch: npm run watch-node & npm run watch-js
scripts.watch-js: watchify public-dev/src/main.js -o public-dev/src/bundle.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 stage-1 ] ]

author: Michael Brewer <constablebrew@gmail.com>
